content: धूमः [धू-कंपे मक्] {@--1@} Smoke, vapour; धूमज्योतिःसलिलमरुतां सन्निपातः क्व मेघः <ls>Me. 5.</ls> {@--2@} Mist, haze. {@--3@} ({%a%}) A meteor. ({%b%}) The fall of a meteor. {@--4@} A cloud. {@--5@} Smoke inhaled (as a sternutatory). {@--6@} Belch, eructation. {@--7@} A place prepared for the building of a house.
